P2.postTitle: Get a free domain name（获得一个免费的域名）
P2.description:
#### 1.Apply for a free domain name
[申请域名](https://digitalplat.org/ 'Apply for a free domain name')
#### 2.Register and log in to DigitalPlat
[注册并登录digitalplat](https://www.freedidi.com/?golink=aHR0cHM6Ly9kYXNoLmRvbWFpbi5kaWdpdGFscGxhdC5vcmcvYXV0aC9sb2dpbg== 'Register and log in to DigitalPlat')
#### 3.Host the domain on Cloudflare
[将域名托管到cloudflare中](https://www.cloudflare.com/zh-cn/ 'Host the domain on Cloudflare')
#### 4.Implement a subscription service
[实现订阅服务](https://www.freedidi.com/?golink=aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL3dhbmd3YW5naXQvU3Vic1RyYWNrZXI= 'Implement a subscription service')

####  instructional video  
[利用digitalplat申请域名并支持cloudflare托管以及实现订阅服务](https://www.freedidi.com/20051.html 'instructional video')
#### Teaching blog
[零度博客](https://www.freedidi.com/20033.html#google_vignette 'lingdu')
。

P3.htmlDir: docs/post/How to customize the domain name for the warehouse website you built yourself（-ru-he-jiang-zi-ji-da-jian-de-cang-ku-wang-zhan-ge-xing-hua-she-zhi-yu-ming-）.html
P3.postTitle: How to customize the domain name for the warehouse website you built yourself（如何将自己搭建的仓库网站个性化设置域名）
P3.description:
####   
  **1.Register your own domain name**
#####  method1 :[Detailed tutorial](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Mz421e76M?spm_id_from=333.788.recommend_more_video.0&trackid=web_related_0.router-related-2206419-7clql.1763034575298.406&vd_source=a54473976249c0cc46e4d805546d57fa '详解教程')
#####  method2 :[Detailed tutorial](https://blog.wuchenyuan.dpdns.org/post/Get%20a%20free%20domain%20name%EF%BC%88-huo-de-yi-ge-mian-fei-de-yu-ming-%EF%BC%89.html '详解教程')  @Wu-Chen-Yuan #2 

####
 **2.进入github自己的仓中->setting->Pages ->Custom domain ->添加你自己域名的子域名
在cloudflare中->点击自己申请的域名->DNS->record->添加记录->类型设为Cname ->设置子域名 设置你要指向替换的原地址->保存**

####  [Detailed operations](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV12H4y1N7Q4/?spm_id_from=333.337.search-card.all.click&vd_source=a54473976249c0cc46e4d805546d57fa '详细教程')。
